about_the_game:
Food Park Manager is a cozy, casual, management sim where you build and manage your own food park! Design and grow your own cozy food destination, filled with a wide variety of food stalls, drink stands, and entertainment. From hungry teens to dog-loving parents, it's your job to satisfy every customer's cravings. Expand your park, hire staff, host events, and unlock new cuisines as you transform a simple piece of land into a bustling food park!

FEATURES


🌟 Build and Customize Your Park
Design your very own food park! Choose from a wide range of stalls offering cuisines from around the world. Place benches, decorations, and entertainment to create a cozy atmosphere. Every design choice you make affects customer flow, satisfaction, and even the overall ambiance of your park—so plan carefully to make your park efficient but charming! As your park grows, you’ll unlock more customization options.


🍔 Customize Your Recipes
Perfecting each dish is key to keeping your customers satisfied. Every cuisine has an ideal recipe that will increase your sales and customer satisfaction. But these recipes can also change based on events happening in your park. From food trends and viral recipes, to seasonal ingredients, you'll need to keep up by tweaking your recipes. Be sure to keep an eye on customer satisfaction and reviews to maintain your park's reputation.


👨‍🍳 Hire and Manage Staff
Hire culinarians to prepare delicious dishes, cleaners to keep your park spotless, and entertainers to keep the mood lively. Each staff member comes with their own unique skills and personalities. Make sure you don't overwork them by not being understaffed and providing break rooms. Keep your staff happy and well paid so they stay efficient and ready to serve your hungry customers!


🎉 Adapt to Dynamic Events
From food festivals and viral online recipes, to a sudden influx of cute dogs, your food park is always buzzing with excitement! Adapt to changes in your customer's needs and preferences so they stay happy and keep your park thriving.

Each event presents unique opportunities and challenges. For example, a viral recipe might boost one stall’s popularity but overwhelm your staff if you’re not prepared.
